message: I was looking for some hand illustrations to demo my gestural UI, and I thought I'd share some of the resources that I have stored. I know you all have a ton of this too, so please share so we can collect it all!
Open Source Gesture Library with over 30 hand illustrations to demo tap, drag, flick, zoom, and lots more: http://gestureworks.com/features/open-source-gestures/
Konigi has a ton of useful page layout templates and stencils: http://konigi.com/tools/overview

Note: I want this thread to be for resources that are download-able and vector-based as much as possible... Things we can use in our Fireworks, Illustrator, InDesign, Omnigraffle, Visio, etc. files.  For things like patterns and inspiration, let's start a separate thread, please!
An all-around better "Lorem Ipsum" experience: http://lorem2.com/
and Konigi's recommended tools are excellent as well for all things UX: http://konigi.com/tools/submissions
color customizable icons - a pretty standard set: http://www.iconza.com/
